original_text: Prepare yourselves according to your fathers' houses by your divisions, as prescribed in the writing of David king of Israel and the document of Solomon his son.
korean_text: 너희는 이스라엘 왕 다윗의 글과 다윗의 아들 솔로몬의 글을 준행하여 너희 족속대로 반열을 따라 스스로 준비하고

sentences.original_text: Prepare yourselves according to your fathers' houses
as prescribed in the writing of David king of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 왕 다윗의 글에 기록된 대로

sentences.original_text: and the document of Solomon his son.
